verbs.description: [ARG0: Chinese President Xi Jinping] [V: met] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , and both men claimed their second meeting in less than six weeks was aimed at easing tensions on the Korean Peninsula . It came just weeks before an anticipated summit between Kim and President Trump .
